examples: The workers were all big, burly, hard-hearted men, tromping through the marsh in their heavy boots without sparing so much as a single thought for the masses of tiny frogs they crushed underfoot .

definitions.definition: In the way ; situated so as to obstruct or hinder .
examples: It would be easier to do a big project like that someday when we don't have a bunch of newcomers underfoot .

secondary_definitions: In the way ; situated so as to obstruct or hinder .
